name: NAV
description: NAV Finance is a regulated on-chain hedge fund that provides Structured Investment Products (SIPs) tailored for high-growth opportunities in DeFi. NAV combines institutional-grade portfolio management with on-chain transparency, allowing investors to access narrative-driven strategies, cross-chain yield maximization, and innovative staking models. The fund actively manages risk through dynamic asset allocation, liquid staking, and leveraged yield strategies, ensuring optimized performance in both bullish and bearish market conditions.
